sentence.Network_en: There are two forms of calcium oxalate crystals in Idesia polyc - arpa var. vestila Diels, prisms and druses.

means.word_mean: 1. deciduous round-headed Asiatic tree widely grown in mild climates as an ornamental for its heart-shaped leaves and fragrant yellow-green flowers followed by hanging clusters of fleshy orange-red berries
